## RefObject interface

An Ref object that supports reading &amp; writing in the same tracked scope by providing a specific [RefObject.update()](./reactive.refobject.update.md) method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RefObject<T> extends Ref<T> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Ref](./reactive.ref.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
